dialogue.introduction: Buon Giorno! I am the first of the Zara-class Heavy Cruiser, Zara! "Tenacity" is my motto. Please to meet you, Admiral! Buon Giorno, Admiral! And welcome back. Zara of the Zara-class first heavy cruiser is ready for order. Please be of service for today as well!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the first of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Zara! I don't mean to brag, but I won't lose to any other heavy cruiser in a gunnery duel! I'm a little worried about my little sister, Pola, but that's neither here nor there... Admiral, I'm going to do my best! Heavy Cruiser Zara will join your fleet!
dialogue.secretary1: That's right, it's me, Zara. At the ready! Yep, I'm right there. Good to go whenever!
dialogue.secretary2: I wonder if Pola is alright... Ah... Yes, I'm ready anytime!  Pola, right? Yes, I'm worried. Admiral, will you help look for her with me?
dialogue.secretary3: Even though I said tenacity is my strong point.... this is going too far ! Admiral, I'm going to get angry !
dialogue.secretaryidle: Eh? Pola? She still carries a bottle of booze? That's sounds typically bad. Admiral, where did you saw her? I need to look for her...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, how are you? Good, I'm relieved! Of course, I'm worried about Pola too, but right now it's just us two, right? Hehe... Oh! I didn't mean it in that way, but...
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, what's the matter? This is... eh? A ring? Admiral, you want to remember me even more? I see... It seems my tenacity hits you as well, is it? Hehe... Grazie, Admiral.
dialogue.show_players_score: Intelligence? Yes! I have it with me.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Zara-class heavy cruiser, Zara, set sail! Away to the fleet, sally go!
dialogue.equipment1: I'm actually a Treaty heavy cruiser... Ah, this is good! Good indeed. I'm actually a Treaty heavy cruiser... Ah, this is good! Radar sure is great.
dialogue.equipment2: Torpedo tubes...? No, I don't need it. It's not needed for me. But I don't mind equipping it. Is this really an oxygen torpedo? Yes! Grazie, Admiral!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: They got me. Sorry. I'm going to the shower. Just a moment, I'll be done in a moment.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Sheesh... my clothes and equipment is in shambles! I still lack toughness! But next time I will succeed!
dialogue.ship_construction: Admiral, A new ship has been constructed.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Pola, you okay? No booze for you today. Zara's fleet, moving out! Follow my lead!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy ships spotted, ready for shelling! Now, let's begin us Zara's battle!
dialogue.attack: Main batteries to the enemy ship dead center. Commencing assault! Sink away!
dialogue.night_battle: Night battle... Sounds good. Finally we, the Zaras will show what we're made of. All fleets, follow my lead. We're breaking through!
dialogue.night_attack: Battery number four, I'm counting on you. My tenaciousness is depending on this shot!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Battery number four, I'm counting on you. My tenaciousness is depending on this shot!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Battery number four, I'm counting on you. My tenaciousness is depending on this shot!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Battery number four, I'm counting on you. My tenaciousness is depending on this shot!
dialogue.mvp: Eh? I'm number one? Grazie! I'll take the prize. Hehe...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Kya! My plate won't fall off from just that!
dialogue.sunk: It's cold...water is... I see... Pola, don't drink too much... Okay?... I will...be going...ahead...

hourly.0000: Buona sera! Admiral, I'll be in charge of secretary duties today. Is that okay?
hourly.0100: Um... Zero one... zero zero hours. Like that? That's how? Ufufu, good. Zero zero!
hourly.0200: 02..00 hours. Yes, it's the middle of the night. I hope Pola's not still out drinking... I'm a little worried.
hourly.0300: 0300 hours. Alright, I think I'm getting used to it. Admiral, aren't I doing it perfectly? Ehe~
hourly.0400: 0400 hours. It'll be morning soon. I'm a little tired, but... I'll keep going, Admiral!
hourly.0500: 0500 hours. Alright, it's morning! Admiral, we stayed up all night, didn't we? Now everyone in the fleet is getting up and going through their morning rituals too... yeah!
hourly.0600: 0600 hours. Buon giorno. The morning sun feels good, doesn't it Admiral?
hourly.0700: 0700 hours. Admiral, I made breakfast for you. It's just a simple espresso and a fresh croissant, but please enjoy.
hourly.0800: 0800 hours. Admiral, would you like another espresso? R-really? Okay, I'll bring it right out!
hourly.0900: 0900 hours. Okay, time to start making use of the fleet. First up are the expeditions... oh? You want to do something else? Roger!
hourly.1000: 1000 hours. Which practice exercise did you want? I kind of want to take a crack at those Takaaao-class! Admiral, is that alright? Ehe... roger.
hourly.1100: 1100 hours. Those Takaaao sisters surprised me. I took some hits, but... how do I say it... it wasn't that bad. I'll challenge them again any day!
hourly.1200: 1200 hours. What would you like for lunch? I learned to make a new sort of pasta--would you want to try it? Do you prefer rosso or bianco?
hourly.1300: 1300 hours. How was it? Since it has a strong flavor, it's best to drink some wine first. Oh! But don't drink too much.
hourly.1400: 14--Ah, Ciao, Libe! How are you? That's good to hear. I made a lot of new friends. Eh? I'll introduce you next time!
hourly.1500: 1500 hours. Oh, RADAR? Um, I think I might need it. They call it "dentaaan" here, right?
hourly.1600: 160--Ah, Roma and Littorio! Ciao! Oh... yes, I'm still getting used to it. I'm sure there's a lot you both could teach me.
hourly.1700: 1700 hours. Admiral, what do you want to do for dinner? You want to go to "Mamiiiya"? Mamiiiya! Is that some sort of bar?
hourly.1800: 1800 hours. So this is Mamiiiya's Bar... wah, something smells really good. Oh, my order... I'll have what the Admiral is having.
hourly.1900: 1900 hours. Admiral, is thish what Japanesh food tastesh like? Making the bestsh use of raw ingredients. I should... mmm... mph!
hourly.2000: 2000 hours. This is also tasty... wait, who's that! Po... Pola!? She's here.. it can't be! Admiral, excuse me! Wait up!
hourly.2100: *pant* 21... *pant* 00... hours. I'm so sorry, Admiral. It turned out to be nothing. Nothing... at all...
hourly.2200: 2200 hours. Admiral, you worked hard today. Is it alright if I turn in early? I'm just a little... tired.
hourly.2300: 2300 hours. You've had a long day, Admiral, so don't work too late. Buona notte!
